item.description:
Joining us in January will be the Reverend Father Scott Rassbach+, Prefect for the Congregation for Liturgical Rites in the AJC and Rector of St. Gabriel's Parish in Madison, Wisconsin. Father Rassbach+ will be performing the Johannite Holy Liturgy for us and discussing anything we might like to talk about with him. So if you've never seen what a Christian Gnostic Eucharist service looks like, here's your chance! Membership in the AJC is not required for participation in or observation of the Holy Liturgy.

Please RSVP either Yes, No, or Maybe. It really helps us plan for our meetings.

And as always, please contact me with any question, comments or concerns!
In Gnosis,
Anthony

group.name: St. Sarah's Parish :: Gnostic Church and Discussion Group

item.name: January Narthex Meeting
